comment.author: 15936015@N04
comment._content: Looks like they are being hoisted aboard a *barge*.

comment.author: 49229907@N05
comment._content: Is that a Boeing B-25 Mitchell frame?

comment.author: 66722821@N00
comment._content: No, an early Douglas A-20 Boston, used under lend-lease by the Brits, French and Russians, though the date of this photo means these were destined for the UK as France was out of the war and Russia not yet in it.
